name: XDR - Suspicious PowerShell Encoded Command
description: Base64 인코딩된 PowerShell 명령 실행 탐지
query: process where event.action == "start" and process.name == "powershell.exe" and process.command_line : ("*-enc*", "*-EncodedCommand*", "*-ec*")

name: XDR - Suspicious Network Connection to Rare External IP
description: 드문 외부 IP로의 네트워크 연결 탐지
query: network where event.action == "connection_attempted" and not destination.ip : ("10.*", "172.16.*", "192.168.*", "127.*")

name: XDR - Cross-Layer: Phishing to Execution Chain
description: 피싱 이메일 수신 후 의심스러운 프로세스 실행 탐지
query: sequence by host.name with maxspan=30m [any where event.category == "email" and email.attachments.file.extension : ("exe","js","vbs","ps1")] [process where event.action == "start" and process.parent.name : ("outlook.exe","thunderbird.exe")]

name: XDR - Potential Data Exfiltration via DNS
description: DNS를 통한 데이터 유출 의심 활동 탐지
